    67→def build_use_skill_tool() -> Dict[str, Any]:
    68→    """
    69→    动态构建 use_skill 工具定义
    70→
    71→    从 SKILL.md 自动读取：
    72→    - 可用的 Skills 列表
    73→    - 每个 Skill 的语义描述（用于 LLM 理解）
    74→    - 每个 Skill 的场景列表
    75→
    76→    v7.3: 改为语义描述驱动，让 LLM 基于理解而非关键词匹配来选择 skill
    77→    """
    78→    available_skills = [s for s in get_available_skills() if s != "core"]
    79→
    80→    # 构建 Skill 路由说明（语义描述 + 触发词辅助）
    81→    skill_routing = "## Skill 路由（基于语义理解选择最匹配的 skill）\n\n"
    82→    for skill_id in available_skills:
    83→        skill = load_skill(skill_id)
    84→        if skill:
    85→            # 提取 description 中触发词之前的部分作为语义描述
    86→            desc = skill.description
    87→            if "触发词" in desc:
    88→                desc = desc.split("触发词")[0].strip().rstrip("。")
    89→            # 限制长度
    90→            if len(desc) > 100:
    91→                desc = desc[:100] + "..."
    92→            skill_routing += f"### {skill_id}\n{desc}\n"
    93→            # 触发词作为辅助提示
    94→            if skill.triggers:
    95→                trigger_str = "、".join(skill.triggers[:5])
    96→                skill_routing += f"常见关键词：{trigger_str}\n"
    97→            skill_routing += "\n"
    98→
    99→    # 构建场景目录（只列出主要场景，避免 description 过长）
   100→    scenario_catalog = "\n## 场景目录（常用）\n"
   101→    for skill_id in available_skills:
   102→        scenarios = get_skill_scenarios(skill_id)
   103→        if scenarios:
   104→            # 只列出前5个场景
   105→            top_scenarios = scenarios[:5]
   106→            scenario_catalog += f"\n### {skill_id}\n"
   107→            for s in top_scenarios:
   108→                scenario_catalog += f"- {s}\n"
   109→            if len(scenarios) > 5:
   110→                scenario_catalog += f"- ... (共 {len(scenarios)} 个场景)\n"
   111→
   112→    description = f"""激活专业技能来回答用户问题。一次决定 skill、scenario 和 confidence。
   113→
   114→{skill_routing}
   115→{scenario_catalog}
   116→
   117→## Confidence 说明
   118→- high: 用户意图明确，直接执行
   119→- medium: 基本确定，可能需要追问细节
   120→- low: 不确定，需要向用户确认
   121→
   122→重要：如果用户消息中已经包含了出生信息，设置 birth_info_provided=true。"""
   123→
   124→    return {
   125→        "type": "function",
   126→        "function": {
   127→            "name": "use_skill",
   128→            "description": description,
   129→            "parameters": {
   130→                "type": "object",
   131→                "properties": {
   132→                    "skill": {
   133→                        "type": "string",
   134→                        "enum": available_skills,
   135→                        "description": "要使用的技能"
   136→                    },
   137→                    "scenario": {
   138→                        "type": "string",
   139→                        "description": "场景 ID，参考上方场景目录"
   140→                    },
   141→                    "confidence": {
   142→                        "type": "string",
   143→                        "enum": ["high", "medium", "low"],
   144→                        "description": "路由置信度"
   145→                    },
   146→                    "topic": {
   147→                        "type": "string",
   148→                        "enum": ["career", "relationship", "fortune", "health", "self", "general"],
   149→                        "description": "用户关注的话题类型"
   150→                    },
   151→                    "birth_info_provided": {
   152→                        "type": "boolean",
   153→                        "description": "用户消息中是否已包含出生信息"
   154→                    }
   155→                },
   156→                "required": ["skill", "scenario", "confidence"]
   157→            }
   158→        }
   159→    }
   160→
   161→
   162→# 缓存动态生成的工具定义
   163→_USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
   164→
   165→
   166→def get_use_skill_tool() -> Dict[str, Any]:
   167→    """获取 use_skill 工具定义（带缓存）"""
   168→    global _USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE
   169→    if _USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE is None:
   170→        _USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE = build_use_skill_tool()
   171→    return _USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE
   172→
   173→
   174→class CoreAgent:
   175→    """
   176→    CoreAgent v6 - 支持 Scenario 路由和 PostgreSQL 知识检索
   177→
   178→    Features:
   179→    - Scenario routing via PostgreSQL
   180→    - Knowledge retrieval (RAG + cases)
   181→    - 7-phase SOP execution
   182→    - Tool-card mapping
   183→    """
   184→
   185→    def __init__(
   186→        self,
   187→        llm: Optional[LLMClient] = None,
   188→        max_iterations: int = 10,
   189→        knowledge_repo: Optional[KnowledgeRepository] = None
   190→    ):
   191→        self.llm = llm or get_llm_client()
   192→        self.max_iterations = max_iterations
   193→        self.knowledge_repo = knowledge_repo or get_knowledge_repository()
   194→        self.state = AgentState.IDLE
   195→        self._active_skill: Optional[str] = None
   196→        self._active_scenario: Optional[str] = None
   197→        self._topic: Optional[str] = None
   198→        self._current_message: str = ""
   199→
   200→    @property
   201→    def usage(self) -> Dict[str, int]:
   202→        """获取 LLM 使用统计"""
   203→        return self.llm.usage
   204→
   205→    async def run(
   206→        self,
   207→        message: str,
   208→        context: AgentContext
   209→    ) -> AsyncGenerator[AgentEvent, None]:
   210→        """执行 Agent 循环"""
   211→        self.state = AgentState.IDLE
   212→        self._current_message = message
   213→        self._perf_log = {"iterations": 0, "llm_calls": []}
   214→
   215→        # 使用前端指定的 skill/scenario，或让 LLM 决定
   216→        if context.skill:
   217→            self._active_skill = context.skill
   218→            self._active_scenario = context.scenario or await self._route_scenario(context.skill, message)
   219→        else:
   220→            self._active_skill = None
   221→            self._active_scenario = None
   222→
   223→        # v7.2: 移除 SOPEngine，改为 LLM 驱动
   224→        # SOP 规则和状态将通过 System Prompt 传达给 LLM
   225→        # LLM 自主决定是否需要收集信息或计算
   226→        if self._active_skill:
   227→            # 计算当前状态，用于前端显示和 Prompt 构建
   228→            sop_status = self._compute_sop_status(context)
   229→
   230→            yield AgentEvent(type="sop_phase", data={
   231→                "skill": self._active_skill,
   232→                "scenario": self._active_scenario,
   233→                "status": sop_status,
   234→                "message": "LLM 驱动模式"
   235→            })
   236→
   237→        # [PERF T6] 构建初始消息
   238→        t_prompt_start = time.time()
   239→        messages = await self._build_initial_messages(message, context)
   240→        self._perf_log["prompt_build_ms"] = int((time.time() - t_prompt_start) * 1000)
   241→        self._perf_log["system_prompt_len"] = len(messages[0].content) if messages else 0
   242→        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Prompt built: {self._perf_log['prompt_build_ms']}ms, len={self._perf_log['system_prompt_len']}")
   243→
   244→        for iteration in range(self.max_iterations):
   245→            self.state = AgentState.THINKING
   246→            yield AgentEvent(type="thinking", data={"iteration": iteration})
   247→            self._perf_log["iterations"] = iteration + 1
   248→
   249→            tools = self._get_current_tools(context)
   250→
   251→            try:
   252→                content_buffer = ""
   253→                tool_calls = []
   254→
   255→                # [PERF T7/T9] LLM 调用
   256→                t_llm_start = time.time()
   257→                first_token_time = None
   258→
   259→                async for chunk in self.llm.stream(
   260→                    messages=messages,
   261→                    tools=tools,
   262→                    tool_choice=None,
   263→                    user_tier=context.user_tier
   264→                ):
   265→                    # 记录首 token 时间
   266→                    if first_token_time is None:
   267→                        first_token_time = time.time()
   268→                        ttft = int((first_token_time - t_llm_start) * 1000)
   269→                        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] LLM #{iteration+1} TTFT: {ttft}ms")
   270→
   271→                    if chunk["type"] == "content":
   272→                        content_buffer += chunk["content"]
   273→                        yield AgentEvent(type="content", data={"content": chunk["content"]})
   274→                    elif chunk["type"] == "tool_call":
   275→                        tool_calls.append(chunk)
   276→
   277→                # [PERF] LLM 调用完成
   278→                llm_total = int((time.time() - t_llm_start) * 1000)
   279→                self._perf_log["llm_calls"].append({
   280→                    "iteration": iteration + 1,
   281→                    "ttft_ms": int((first_token_time - t_llm_start) * 1000) if first_token_time else 0,
   282→                    "total_ms": llm_total,
   283→                    "has_tools": len(tool_calls) > 0
   284→                })
   285→                logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] LLM #{iteration+1} total: {llm_total}ms, tools={len(tool_calls)}")
   286→
   287→                if tool_calls:
   288→                    self.state = AgentState.TOOL_CALLING
   289→
   290→                    assistant_tool_calls = []
   291→                    for tc in tool_calls:
   292→                        assistant_tool_calls.append({
   293→                            "id": tc["tool_call_id"],
   294→                            "function": {
   295→                                "name": tc["tool_name"],
   296→                                "arguments": tc["tool_args"]
   297→                            }
   298→                        })
   299→                    messages.append(LLMMessage(
   300→                        role="assistant",
   301→                        content=content_buffer or "",
   302→                        tool_calls=assistant_tool_calls
   303→                    ))
   304→                    content_buffer = ""
   305→
   306→                    # [PERF T8] 工具执行
   307→                    t_tools_start = time.time()
   308→                    tool_results = []
   309→                    for tc in tool_calls:
   310→                        tool_name = tc["tool_name"]
   311→                        tool_args = tc["tool_args"]
   312→                        tool_call_id = tc["tool_call_id"]
   313→
   314→                        yield AgentEvent(type="tool_call", data={
   315→                            "id": tool_call_id,
   316→                            "name": tool_name,
   317→                            "arguments": tool_args
   318→                        })
   319→
   320→                        t_tool_start = time.time()
   321→                        result = await self._execute_tool(tool_name, tool_args, context)
   322→                        tool_exec_ms = int((time.time() - t_tool_start) * 1000)
   323→                        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Tool {tool_name}: {tool_exec_ms}ms")
   324→
   325→                        tool_results.append({
   326→                            "tool_call_id": tool_call_id,
   327→                            "result": result
   328→                        })
   329→
   330→                        yield AgentEvent(type="tool_result", data={
   331→                            "id": tool_call_id,
   332→                            "name": tool_name,
   333→                            "result": result
   334→                        })
   335→
   336→                    tools_total = int((time.time() - t_tools_start) * 1000)
   337→                    logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] All tools: {tools_total}ms")
   338→
   339→                    for tr in tool_results:
   340→                        result_content = tr["result"]
   341→                        if isinstance(result_content, dict):
   342→                            result_content = json.dumps(result_content, ensure_ascii=False)
   343→                        messages.append(LLMMessage(
   344→                            role="tool",
   345→                            content=str(result_content),
   346→                            tool_call_id=tr["tool_call_id"]
   347→                        ))
   348→                else:
   349→                    self.state = AgentState.COMPLETED
   350→                    logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Done: {self._perf_log}")
   351→                    yield AgentEvent(type="done", data={"content": content_buffer})
   352→                    return
   353→
   354→            except Exception as e:
   355→                self.state = AgentState.ERROR
   356→                logger.error(f"Agent error: {e}")
   357→                yield AgentEvent(type="error", data={"error": str(e)})
   358→                return
   359→
   360→        self.state = AgentState.COMPLETED
   361→        yield AgentEvent(type="done", data={"max_iterations_reached": True})
   362→
   363→    def _filter_valid_history(self, history: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   364→        """
   365→        过滤历史消息，确保 tool 消息配对完整。
   366→
   367→        Anthropic API 要求每个 tool_result 必须有对应的 tool_use。
   368→        如果历史消息不完整（如只有 tool 消息没有对应的 assistant tool_calls），
   369→        需要过滤掉这些孤立的消息。
   370→        """
   371→        if not history:
   372→            return []
   373→
   374→        # 收集所有有效的 tool_call_ids（来自 assistant 的 tool_calls）
   375→        valid_tool_ids = set()
   376→        for msg in history:
   377→            if msg.get("role") == "assistant" and msg.get("tool_calls"):
   378→                for tc in msg["tool_calls"]:
   379→                    tc_id = tc.get("id")
   380→                    if tc_id:
   381→                        valid_tool_ids.add(tc_id)
   382→
   383→        # 过滤消息
   384→        filtered = []
   385→        for msg in history:
   386→            role = msg.get("role", "user")
   387→
   388→            # tool 消息需要检查是否有对应的 tool_use
   389→            if role == "tool":
   390→                tool_call_id = msg.get("tool_call_id")
   391→                if tool_call_id and tool_call_id in valid_tool_ids:
   392→                    filtered.append(msg)
   393→                else:
   394→                    # 孤立的 tool 消息，跳过
   395→                    logger.warning(f"Skipping orphan tool message: {tool_call_id}")
   396→            else:
   397→                # user/assistant 消息直接保留
   398→                filtered.append(msg)
   399→
   400→        return filtered
   401→
   402→    async def _route_scenario(self, skill_id: str, message: str) -> Optional[str]:
   403→        """场景路由 - 根据消息匹配最佳场景"""
   404→        try:
   405→            matches = await self.knowledge_repo.route_scenario(skill_id, message)
   406→            if matches:
   407→                return matches[0].scenario_id
   408→        except Exception as e:
   409→            logger.warning(f"Scenario routing failed: {e}")
   410→
   411→        # 回退到默认场景
   412→        skill = load_skill(skill_id)
   413→        return skill.default_scenario if skill else "basic_reading"
   414→
   415→    async def _build_initial_messages(
   416→        self,
   417→        message: str,
   418→        context: AgentContext
   419→    ) -> List[LLMMessage]:
   420→        """构建初始消息列表"""
   421→        system_prompt = await self._build_system_prompt(message, context)
   422→
   423→        messages = [LLMMessage(role="system", content=system_prompt)]
   424→
   425→        if context.history:
   426→            # 过滤并验证历史消息，确保 tool 消息配对完整
   427→            filtered_history = self._filter_valid_history(context.history[-10:])
   428→            for msg in filtered_history:
   429→                messages.append(LLMMessage(
   430→                    role=msg.get("role", "user"),
   431→                    content=msg.get("content", ""),
   432→                    tool_call_id=msg.get("tool_call_id"),
   433→                    tool_calls=msg.get("tool_calls")
   434→                ))
   435→
   436→        messages.append(LLMMessage(role="user", content=message))
   437→        return messages
   438→
   439→    def _compute_sop_status(self, context: AgentContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   440→        """
   441→        v7.2: 计算 SOP 状态（替代 SOPEngine）
   442→
   443→        返回当前状态信息，用于：
   444→        1. 前端显示
   445→        2. System Prompt 构建
   446→        """
   447→        skill_id = self._active_skill
   448→
   449→        # 检查是否需要出生信息
   450→        needs_birth = skill_requires_birth_info(skill_id) if skill_id else False
   451→        birth_info = context.profile.get("birth_info", {}) if context.profile else {}
   452→        has_birth = bool(
   453→            birth_info.get("birth_date") or birth_info.get("date")
   454→        )
   455→
   456→        # 检查是否需要计算
   457→        needs_compute = skill_requires_compute(skill_id) if skill_id else False
   458→        compute_type = get_skill_compute_type(skill_id) if skill_id else None
   459→        actual_compute_type = compute_type or skill_id
   460→
   461→        # 检查是否有命盘数据
   462→        has_chart = False
   463→        if context.skill_data and actual_compute_type:
   464→            skill_data = context.skill_data.get(actual_compute_type, {})
   465→            # 通用检查：chart 或 cards
   466→            has_chart = bool(skill_data.get("chart") or skill_data.get("cards"))
   467→
   468→        return {
   469→            "skill_id": skill_id,
   470→            "needs_birth_info": needs_birth,
   471→            "has_birth_info": has_birth,
   472→            "needs_compute": needs_compute,
   473→            "has_chart_data": has_chart,
   474→            "compute_type": actual_compute_type,
   475→            "ready_for_analysis": (not needs_birth or has_birth) and (not needs_compute or has_chart)
   476→        }
   477→
   478→    def _build_sop_rules(self, context: AgentContext) -> str:
   479→        """
   480→        v7.2: 构建 SOP 规则（替代 SOPEngine）
   481→
   482→        将 SOP 规则通过 System Prompt 传达给 LLM，
   483→        让 LLM 自主决定执行流程。
   484→        """
   485→        skill_id = self._active_skill
   486→        if not skill_id:
   487→            return ""
   488→
   489→        # 获取配置
   490→        needs_birth = skill_requires_birth_info(skill_id)
   491→        needs_compute = skill_requires_compute(skill_id)
   492→        compute_type = get_skill_compute_type(skill_id) or skill_id
   493→
   494→        # 计算当前状态
   495→        status = self._compute_sop_status(context)
   496→
   497→        rules = "\n## SOP 执行规则（必须遵守）\n\n"
   498→
   499→        # P1: 信息收集
   500→        if needs_birth:
   501→            if not status["has_birth_info"]:
   502→                # v7.3: 从 SKILL.md 配置读取 collect_tool，不再硬编码
   503→                collect_tool = get_skill_collect_tool(skill_id)
   504→                if not collect_tool:
   505→                    # 默认约定：request_info
   506→                    collect_tool = "request_info"
   507→
   508→                rules += f"""### P1: 信息收集 ⚠️ 需要执行
   509→用户尚未提供出生信息。你必须：
   510→1. 首先调用 `{collect_tool}` 工具展示收集表单
   511→2. 不要用文字询问，必须使用工具
   512→3. 收集到信息后再进行下一步
   513→
   514→"""
   515→            else:
   516→                rules += """### P1: 信息收集 ✅ 已完成
   517→用户已提供出生信息。
   518→
   519→"""
   520→
   521→        # P2: 计算排盘
   522→        if needs_compute:
   523→            if not status["has_chart_data"]:
   524→                # v7.3: 从 SKILL.md 配置读取 compute_tool，不再硬编码
   525→                compute_tool = get_skill_compute_tool(skill_id)
   526→                if not compute_tool:
   527→                    # 默认约定：calculate_{compute_type}
   528→                    compute_tool = f"calculate_{compute_type}"
   529→
   530→                rules += f"""### P2: 计算排盘 ⚠️ 需要执行
   531→用户尚未有命盘数据。你必须：
   532→1. 调用 `{compute_tool}` 工具生成命盘数据
   533→2. 计算完成后再进行分析
   534→
   535→"""
   536→            else:
   537→                rules += """### P2: 计算排盘 ✅ 已完成
   538→用户已有命盘数据。
   539→
   540→"""
   541→
   542→        # P3-P7: LLM 自由发挥
   543→        rules += """### P3-P7: 分析与输出
   544→完成信息收集和计算后，按以下流程执行：
   545→1. **扫描**: 快速识别命盘中的关键模式和特征
   546→2. **追问**: 根据需要向用户提出针对性问题
   547→3. **分析**: 深度分析，结合知识库检索结果
   548→4. **输出**: 调用展示工具（show_xxx）呈现分析结果
   549→5. **讨论**: 回答用户的追问
   550→
   551→"""
   552→
   553→        # 当前状态摘要
   554→        rules += "### 当前状态\n"
   555→        rules += f"- 出生信息: {'✅ 已有' if status['has_birth_info'] else '❌ 未收集'}\n"
   556→        rules += f"- 命盘数据: {'✅ 已计算' if status['has_chart_data'] else '❌ 未计算'}\n"
   557→        rules += f"- 可以分析: {'✅ 是' if status['ready_for_analysis'] else '❌ 否，请先完成上述步骤'}\n"
   558→
   559→        return rules
   560→
   561→    async def _build_system_prompt(self, message: str, context: AgentContext) -> str:
   562→        """构建 System Prompt - v7.2: 包含 SOP 规则"""
   563→        parts = []
   564→
   565→        # 基础 prompt
   566→        if self._active_skill:
   567→            # 传递完整 profile，让 skill_loader 自动处理所有字段
   568→            user_ctx = dict(context.profile) if context.profile else {}
   569→            user_ctx["portrait"] = context.portrait
   570→            base_prompt = build_system_prompt(
   571→                self._active_skill,
   572→                self._active_scenario,
   573→                user_ctx
   574→            )
   575→            parts.append(base_prompt)
   576→
   577→            # v7.2: 添加 SOP 规则（替代 SOPEngine）
   578→            sop_rules = self._build_sop_rules(context)
   579→            if sop_rules:
   580→                parts.append(sop_rules)
   581→
   582→            # 知识检索
   583→            try:
   584→                knowledge = await self.knowledge_repo.search_knowledge(
   585→                    self._active_skill, message, top_k=5
   586→                )
   587→                if knowledge:
   588→                    knowledge_text = "\n## 相关知识\n\n"
   589→                    for chunk in knowledge:
   590→                        knowledge_text += f"**{chunk.book_name}** ({chunk.chapter or ''})\n{chunk.chunk_text[:500]}...\n\n"
   591→                    parts.append(knowledge_text)
   592→            except Exception as e:
   593→                logger.warning(f"Knowledge retrieval failed: {e}")
   594→
   595→            # 案例匹配 - 使用智能匹配器
   596→            try:
   597→                from .case_matcher import match_cases_smart
   598→                cases = await match_cases_smart(
   599→                    self.knowledge_repo,
   600→                    skill_id=self._active_skill,
   601→                    scenario_id=self._active_scenario,
   602→                    skill_data=context.skill_data,
   603→                    top_k=2
   604→                )
   605→                if cases:
   606→                    cases_text = "\n## 相关案例\n\n"
   607→                    for case in cases:
   608→                        cases_text += f"**{case.name}**\n{json.dumps(case.conclusion, ensure_ascii=False)}\n\n"
   609→                    parts.append(cases_text)
   610→            except Exception as e:
   611→                logger.warning(f"Case matching failed: {e}")
   612→        else:
   613→            # 无 skill 时，添加触发规则
   614→            triggers = get_skill_triggers()
   615→            if triggers:
   616→                trigger_rules = "## 技能触发规则\n\n当用户消息包含以下关键词时，调用 `use_skill` 工具：\n"
   617→                for skill_name, keywords in triggers.items():
   618→                    trigger_rules += f"- **{skill_name}**: {', '.join(keywords)}\n"
   619→                parts.append(trigger_rules)
   620→
   621→        # 用户命盘数据（使用 compute_type 读取，支持跨 skill 复用）
   622→        if context.skill_data and self._active_skill:
   623→            compute_type = get_skill_compute_type(self._active_skill) or self._active_skill
   624→            skill_data = context.skill_data.get(compute_type, {})
   625→            if skill_data:
   626→                parts.append(f"\n## 用户命盘数据\n{json.dumps(skill_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)}")
   627→
   628→        return "\n".join(parts)
   629→
   630→    def _get_current_tools(self, context: AgentContext) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   631→        """获取当前可用工具 - V6: 从统一注册表获取"""
   632→        if not context.skill and not self._active_skill:
   633→            return [get_use_skill_tool()]
   634→
   635→        skill_id = self._active_skill or context.skill
   636→
   637→        # 从统一注册表获取工具（YAML 为数据源）
   638→        tools = ToolRegistry.get_tools_for_skill(skill_id)
   639→        return tools if tools else [get_use_skill_tool()]
   640→
   641→    async def _execute_tool(
   642→        self,
   643→        tool_name: str,
   644→        tool_args: str,
   645→        context: AgentContext
   646→    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   647→        """执行工具调用 - V6.1: 完全使用统一注册表"""
   648→        try:
   649→            args = json.loads(tool_args) if tool_args else {}
   650→        except json.JSONDecodeError:
   651→            args = {}
   652→
   653→        # 特殊处理 use_skill（路由工具）
   654→        if tool_name == "use_skill":
   655→            return await self._handle_use_skill(args, context)
   656→
   657→        # 创建工具上下文
   658→        tool_context = ToolContext(
   659→            user_id=context.user_id,
   660→            user_tier=context.user_tier,
   661→            profile=context.profile or {},
   662→            skill_data=context.skill_data or {},
   663→            skill_id=self._active_skill,
   664→            scenario_id=self._active_scenario,
   665→            conversation_id=context.conversation_id
   666→        )
   667→
   668→        # 使用统一注册表执行工具
   669→        if ToolRegistry.has_handler(tool_name):
   670→            return await ToolRegistry.execute(tool_name, args, tool_context)
   671→
   672→        # 未找到处理器
   673→        logger.warning(f"No handler found for tool: {tool_name}")
   674→        return {"status": "unknown_tool", "tool": tool_name, "message": f"工具 {tool_name} 暂未实现"}
   675→
   676→    async def _handle_use_skill(
   677→        self,
   678→        args: Dict[str, Any],
   679→        context: AgentContext
   680→    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   681→        """处理 skill 选择 - V6: 一次决定 skill + scenario + confidence"""
   682→        skill = args.get("skill")
   683→        scenario = args.get("scenario", "basic_reading")
   684→        confidence = args.get("confidence", "high")
   685→        topic = args.get("topic", "general")
   686→
   687→        if not skill:
   688→            return {"status": "error", "message": "No skill specified"}
   689→
   690→        self._active_skill = skill
   691→        self._active_scenario = scenario
   692→        self._topic = topic
   693→
   694→        # 低置信度时，返回确认请求
   695→        if confidence == "low":
   696→            return {
   697→                "status": "need_confirm",
   698→                "skill": skill,
   699→                "scenario": scenario,
   700→                "confidence": confidence,
   701→                "message": f"我理解您可能想使用 {skill} 的 {scenario} 服务，请确认是否正确？"
   702→            }
   703→
   704→        # 检查是否需要出生信息（v7.1: 配置驱动）
   705→        needs_birth = skill_requires_birth_info(skill)
   706→        birth_info = context.profile.get("birth_info", {}) if context.profile else {}
   707→        has_birth = bool(birth_info.get("birth_date") or birth_info.get("date"))
   708→        birth_provided = args.get("birth_info_provided", False)
   709→
   710→        if needs_birth and not has_birth and not birth_provided:
   711→            # v7.3: 从 SKILL.md 配置读取 collect_tool
   712→            collect_tool = get_skill_collect_tool(skill) or "request_info"
   713→            return {
   714→                "status": "need_info",
   715→                "skill": skill,
   716→                "scenario": scenario,
   717→                "confidence": confidence,
   718→                "topic": topic,
   719→                "info_type": "birth",
   720→                "message": f"技能已激活。请调用 {collect_tool} 工具收集出生信息。"
   721→            }
   722→
   723→        return {
   724→            "status": "activated",
   725→            "skill": skill,
   726→            "scenario": scenario,
   727→            "confidence": confidence,
   728→            "topic": topic,
   729→            "message": f"已激活 {skill} 技能，场景: {scenario}"
   730→        }
   731→
   732→
   733→def create_agent(
   734→    llm: Optional[LLMClient] = None,
   735→    max_iterations: int = 10
   736→) -> CoreAgent:
   737→    """创建 CoreAgent 实例"""
   738→    return CoreAgent(llm=llm, max_iterations=max_iterations)
   739→

"""
CoreAgent v6 - 支持 Scenario 路由和 PostgreSQL 知识检索的智能体

v6 架构特性：
- Scenario 路由：根据用户消息匹配最佳场景
- PostgreSQL 知识检索：RAG + 案例匹配
- 7 阶段 SOP：P1-P2 强制，P3-P7 LLM 自由发挥
- 工具-卡片映射：标准化工具元数据
"""
import json
import logging
import time
from typing import Optional, List, Dict, Any, AsyncGenerator
from dataclasses import dataclass
from enum import Enum

from services.llm import LLMClient, get_llm_client
from services.llm.client import LLMMessage
from services.knowledge.repository import get_knowledge_repository, KnowledgeRepository
from .skill_loader import (
    load_skill, get_skill_triggers,
    build_system_prompt,
    get_available_skills, get_skill_scenarios,
    skill_requires_birth_info,
    skill_requires_compute,
    get_skill_compute_type,
    get_skill_compute_tool,
    get_skill_collect_tool,
)
from .tool_registry import ToolRegistry, ToolContext

logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)


class AgentState(str, Enum):
    """Agent 执行状态"""
    IDLE = "idle"
    THINKING = "thinking"
    TOOL_CALLING = "tool_calling"
    COMPLETED = "completed"
    ERROR = "error"


@dataclass
class AgentEvent:
    """Agent 执行事件"""
    type: str  # thinking, content, tool_call, tool_result, done, error, sop_phase
    data: Any = None


@dataclass
class AgentContext:
    """Agent 执行上下文"""
    user_id: str
    user_tier: str = "free"
    profile: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
    skill_data: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
    history: Optional[List[Dict[str, str]]] = None
    skill: Optional[str] = None
    scenario: Optional[str] = None
    portrait: Optional[str] = None
    conversation_id: Optional[str] = None
    voice_mode: Optional[str] = "warm"
    recent_insights: Optional[List[Any]] = None


def build_use_skill_tool() -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """
    动态构建 use_skill 工具定义

    从 SKILL.md 自动读取：
    - 可用的 Skills 列表
    - 每个 Skill 的语义描述（用于 LLM 理解）
    - 每个 Skill 的场景列表

    v7.3: 改为语义描述驱动，让 LLM 基于理解而非关键词匹配来选择 skill
    """
    available_skills = [s for s in get_available_skills() if s != "core"]

    # 构建 Skill 路由说明（语义描述 + 触发词辅助）
    skill_routing = "## Skill 路由（基于语义理解选择最匹配的 skill）\n\n"
    for skill_id in available_skills:
        skill = load_skill(skill_id)
        if skill:
            # 提取 description 中触发词之前的部分作为语义描述
            desc = skill.description
            if "触发词" in desc:
                desc = desc.split("触发词")[0].strip().rstrip("。")
            # 限制长度
            if len(desc) > 100:
                desc = desc[:100] + "..."
            skill_routing += f"### {skill_id}\n{desc}\n"
            # 触发词作为辅助提示
            if skill.triggers:
                trigger_str = "、".join(skill.triggers[:5])
                skill_routing += f"常见关键词：{trigger_str}\n"
            skill_routing += "\n"

    # 构建场景目录（只列出主要场景，避免 description 过长）
    scenario_catalog = "\n## 场景目录（常用）\n"
    for skill_id in available_skills:
        scenarios = get_skill_scenarios(skill_id)
        if scenarios:
            # 只列出前5个场景
            top_scenarios = scenarios[:5]
            scenario_catalog += f"\n### {skill_id}\n"
            for s in top_scenarios:
                scenario_catalog += f"- {s}\n"
            if len(scenarios) > 5:
                scenario_catalog += f"- ... (共 {len(scenarios)} 个场景)\n"

    description = f"""激活专业技能来回答用户问题。一次决定 skill、scenario 和 confidence。

{skill_routing}
{scenario_catalog}

## Confidence 说明
- high: 用户意图明确，直接执行
- medium: 基本确定，可能需要追问细节
- low: 不确定，需要向用户确认

重要：如果用户消息中已经包含了出生信息，设置 birth_info_provided=true。"""

    return {
        "type": "function",
        "function": {
            "name": "use_skill",
            "description": description,
            "parameters": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                    "skill": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": available_skills,
                        "description": "要使用的技能"
                    },
                    "scenario": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "场景 ID，参考上方场景目录"
                    },
                    "confidence": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": ["high", "medium", "low"],
                        "description": "路由置信度"
                    },
                    "topic": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": ["career", "relationship", "fortune", "health", "self", "general"],
                        "description": "用户关注的话题类型"
                    },
                    "birth_info_provided": {
                        "type": "boolean",
                        "description": "用户消息中是否已包含出生信息"
                    }
                },
                "required": ["skill", "scenario", "confidence"]
            }
        }
    }


# 缓存动态生成的工具定义
_USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None


def get_use_skill_tool() -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """获取 use_skill 工具定义（带缓存）"""
    global _USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE
    if _USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE is None:
        _USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE = build_use_skill_tool()
    return _USE_SKILL_TOOL_CACHE


class CoreAgent:
    """
    CoreAgent v6 - 支持 Scenario 路由和 PostgreSQL 知识检索

    Features:
    - Scenario routing via PostgreSQL
    - Knowledge retrieval (RAG + cases)
    - 7-phase SOP execution
    - Tool-card mapping
    """

    def __init__(
        self,
        llm: Optional[LLMClient] = None,
        max_iterations: int = 10,
        knowledge_repo: Optional[KnowledgeRepository] = None
    ):
        self.llm = llm or get_llm_client()
        self.max_iterations = max_iterations
        self.knowledge_repo = knowledge_repo or get_knowledge_repository()
        self.state = AgentState.IDLE
        self._active_skill: Optional[str] = None
        self._active_scenario: Optional[str] = None
        self._topic: Optional[str] = None
        self._current_message: str = ""

    @property
    def usage(self) -> Dict[str, int]:
        """获取 LLM 使用统计"""
        return self.llm.usage

    async def run(
        self,
        message: str,
        context: AgentContext
    ) -> AsyncGenerator[AgentEvent, None]:
        """执行 Agent 循环"""
        self.state = AgentState.IDLE
        self._current_message = message
        self._perf_log = {"iterations": 0, "llm_calls": []}

        # 使用前端指定的 skill/scenario，或让 LLM 决定
        if context.skill:
            self._active_skill = context.skill
            self._active_scenario = context.scenario or await self._route_scenario(context.skill, message)
        else:
            self._active_skill = None
            self._active_scenario = None

        # v7.2: 移除 SOPEngine，改为 LLM 驱动
        # SOP 规则和状态将通过 System Prompt 传达给 LLM
        # LLM 自主决定是否需要收集信息或计算
        if self._active_skill:
            # 计算当前状态，用于前端显示和 Prompt 构建
            sop_status = self._compute_sop_status(context)

            yield AgentEvent(type="sop_phase", data={
                "skill": self._active_skill,
                "scenario": self._active_scenario,
                "status": sop_status,
                "message": "LLM 驱动模式"
            })

        # [PERF T6] 构建初始消息
        t_prompt_start = time.time()
        messages = await self._build_initial_messages(message, context)
        self._perf_log["prompt_build_ms"] = int((time.time() - t_prompt_start) * 1000)
        self._perf_log["system_prompt_len"] = len(messages[0].content) if messages else 0
        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Prompt built: {self._perf_log['prompt_build_ms']}ms, len={self._perf_log['system_prompt_len']}")

        for iteration in range(self.max_iterations):
            self.state = AgentState.THINKING
            yield AgentEvent(type="thinking", data={"iteration": iteration})
            self._perf_log["iterations"] = iteration + 1

            tools = self._get_current_tools(context)

            try:
                content_buffer = ""
                tool_calls = []

                # [PERF T7/T9] LLM 调用
                t_llm_start = time.time()
                first_token_time = None

                async for chunk in self.llm.stream(
                    messages=messages,
                    tools=tools,
                    tool_choice=None,
                    user_tier=context.user_tier
                ):
                    # 记录首 token 时间
                    if first_token_time is None:
                        first_token_time = time.time()
                        ttft = int((first_token_time - t_llm_start) * 1000)
                        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] LLM #{iteration+1} TTFT: {ttft}ms")

                    if chunk["type"] == "content":
                        content_buffer += chunk["content"]
                        yield AgentEvent(type="content", data={"content": chunk["content"]})
                    elif chunk["type"] == "tool_call":
                        tool_calls.append(chunk)

                # [PERF] LLM 调用完成
                llm_total = int((time.time() - t_llm_start) * 1000)
                self._perf_log["llm_calls"].append({
                    "iteration": iteration + 1,
                    "ttft_ms": int((first_token_time - t_llm_start) * 1000) if first_token_time else 0,
                    "total_ms": llm_total,
                    "has_tools": len(tool_calls) > 0
                })
                logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] LLM #{iteration+1} total: {llm_total}ms, tools={len(tool_calls)}")

                if tool_calls:
                    self.state = AgentState.TOOL_CALLING

                    assistant_tool_calls = []
                    for tc in tool_calls:
                        assistant_tool_calls.append({
                            "id": tc["tool_call_id"],
                            "function": {
                                "name": tc["tool_name"],
                                "arguments": tc["tool_args"]
                            }
                        })
                    messages.append(LLMMessage(
                        role="assistant",
                        content=content_buffer or "",
                        tool_calls=assistant_tool_calls
                    ))
                    content_buffer = ""

                    # [PERF T8] 工具执行
                    t_tools_start = time.time()
                    tool_results = []
                    for tc in tool_calls:
                        tool_name = tc["tool_name"]
                        tool_args = tc["tool_args"]
                        tool_call_id = tc["tool_call_id"]

                        yield AgentEvent(type="tool_call", data={
                            "id": tool_call_id,
                            "name": tool_name,
                            "arguments": tool_args
                        })

                        t_tool_start = time.time()
                        result = await self._execute_tool(tool_name, tool_args, context)
                        tool_exec_ms = int((time.time() - t_tool_start) * 1000)
                        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Tool {tool_name}: {tool_exec_ms}ms")

                        tool_results.append({
                            "tool_call_id": tool_call_id,
                            "result": result
                        })

                        yield AgentEvent(type="tool_result", data={
                            "id": tool_call_id,
                            "name": tool_name,
                            "result": result
                        })

                    tools_total = int((time.time() - t_tools_start) * 1000)
                    logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] All tools: {tools_total}ms")

                    for tr in tool_results:
                        result_content = tr["result"]
                        if isinstance(result_content, dict):
                            result_content = json.dumps(result_content, ensure_ascii=False)
                        messages.append(LLMMessage(
                            role="tool",
                            content=str(result_content),
                            tool_call_id=tr["tool_call_id"]
                        ))
                else:
                    self.state = AgentState.COMPLETED
                    logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Done: {self._perf_log}")
                    yield AgentEvent(type="done", data={"content": content_buffer})
                    return

            except Exception as e:
                self.state = AgentState.ERROR
                logger.error(f"Agent error: {e}")
                yield AgentEvent(type="error", data={"error": str(e)})
                return

        self.state = AgentState.COMPLETED
        yield AgentEvent(type="done", data={"max_iterations_reached": True})

    def _filter_valid_history(self, history: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """
        过滤历史消息，确保 tool 消息配对完整。

        Anthropic API 要求每个 tool_result 必须有对应的 tool_use。
        如果历史消息不完整（如只有 tool 消息没有对应的 assistant tool_calls），
        需要过滤掉这些孤立的消息。
        """
        if not history:
            return []

        # 收集所有有效的 tool_call_ids（来自 assistant 的 tool_calls）
        valid_tool_ids = set()
        for msg in history:
            if msg.get("role") == "assistant" and msg.get("tool_calls"):
                for tc in msg["tool_calls"]:
                    tc_id = tc.get("id")
                    if tc_id:
                        valid_tool_ids.add(tc_id)

        # 过滤消息
        filtered = []
        for msg in history:
            role = msg.get("role", "user")

            # tool 消息需要检查是否有对应的 tool_use
            if role == "tool":
                tool_call_id = msg.get("tool_call_id")
                if tool_call_id and tool_call_id in valid_tool_ids:
                    filtered.append(msg)
                else:
                    # 孤立的 tool 消息，跳过
                    logger.warning(f"Skipping orphan tool message: {tool_call_id}")
            else:
                # user/assistant 消息直接保留
                filtered.append(msg)

        return filtered

    async def _route_scenario(self, skill_id: str, message: str) -> Optional[str]:
        """场景路由 - 根据消息匹配最佳场景"""
        try:
            matches = await self.knowledge_repo.route_scenario(skill_id, message)
            if matches:
                return matches[0].scenario_id
        except Exception as e:
            logger.warning(f"Scenario routing failed: {e}")

        # 回退到默认场景
        skill = load_skill(skill_id)
        return skill.default_scenario if skill else "basic_reading"

    async def _build_initial_messages(
        self,
        message: str,
        context: AgentContext
    ) -> List[LLMMessage]:
        """构建初始消息列表"""
        system_prompt = await self._build_system_prompt(message, context)

        messages = [LLMMessage(role="system", content=system_prompt)]

        if context.history:
            # 过滤并验证历史消息，确保 tool 消息配对完整
            filtered_history = self._filter_valid_history(context.history[-10:])
            for msg in filtered_history:
                messages.append(LLMMessage(
                    role=msg.get("role", "user"),
                    content=msg.get("content", ""),
                    tool_call_id=msg.get("tool_call_id"),
                    tool_calls=msg.get("tool_calls")
                ))

        messages.append(LLMMessage(role="user", content=message))
        return messages

    def _compute_sop_status(self, context: AgentContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        v7.2: 计算 SOP 状态（替代 SOPEngine）

        返回当前状态信息，用于：
        1. 前端显示
        2. System Prompt 构建
        """
        skill_id = self._active_skill

        # 检查是否需要出生信息
        needs_birth = skill_requires_birth_info(skill_id) if skill_id else False
        birth_info = context.profile.get("birth_info", {}) if context.profile else {}
        has_birth = bool(
            birth_info.get("birth_date") or birth_info.get("date")
        )

        # 检查是否需要计算
        needs_compute = skill_requires_compute(skill_id) if skill_id else False
        compute_type = get_skill_compute_type(skill_id) if skill_id else None
        actual_compute_type = compute_type or skill_id

        # 检查是否有命盘数据
        has_chart = False
        if context.skill_data and actual_compute_type:
            skill_data = context.skill_data.get(actual_compute_type, {})
            # 通用检查：chart 或 cards
            has_chart = bool(skill_data.get("chart") or skill_data.get("cards"))

        return {
            "skill_id": skill_id,
            "needs_birth_info": needs_birth,
            "has_birth_info": has_birth,
            "needs_compute": needs_compute,
            "has_chart_data": has_chart,
            "compute_type": actual_compute_type,
            "ready_for_analysis": (not needs_birth or has_birth) and (not needs_compute or has_chart)
        }

    def _build_sop_rules(self, context: AgentContext) -> str:
        """
        v7.2: 构建 SOP 规则（替代 SOPEngine）

        将 SOP 规则通过 System Prompt 传达给 LLM，
        让 LLM 自主决定执行流程。
        """
        skill_id = self._active_skill
        if not skill_id:
            return ""

        # 获取配置
        needs_birth = skill_requires_birth_info(skill_id)
        needs_compute = skill_requires_compute(skill_id)
        compute_type = get_skill_compute_type(skill_id) or skill_id

        # 计算当前状态
        status = self._compute_sop_status(context)

        rules = "\n## SOP 执行规则（必须遵守）\n\n"

        # P1: 信息收集
        if needs_birth:
            if not status["has_birth_info"]:
                # v7.3: 从 SKILL.md 配置读取 collect_tool，不再硬编码
                collect_tool = get_skill_collect_tool(skill_id)
                if not collect_tool:
                    # 默认约定：request_info
                    collect_tool = "request_info"

                rules += f"""### P1: 信息收集 ⚠️ 需要执行
用户尚未提供出生信息。你必须：
1. 首先调用 `{collect_tool}` 工具展示收集表单
2. 不要用文字询问，必须使用工具
3. 收集到信息后再进行下一步

"""
            else:
                rules += """### P1: 信息收集 ✅ 已完成
用户已提供出生信息。

"""

        # P2: 计算排盘
        if needs_compute:
            if not status["has_chart_data"]:
                # v7.3: 从 SKILL.md 配置读取 compute_tool，不再硬编码
                compute_tool = get_skill_compute_tool(skill_id)
                if not compute_tool:
                    # 默认约定：calculate_{compute_type}
                    compute_tool = f"calculate_{compute_type}"

                rules += f"""### P2: 计算排盘 ⚠️ 需要执行
用户尚未有命盘数据。你必须：
1. 调用 `{compute_tool}` 工具生成命盘数据
2. 计算完成后再进行分析

"""
            else:
                rules += """### P2: 计算排盘 ✅ 已完成
用户已有命盘数据。

"""

        # P3-P7: LLM 自由发挥
        rules += """### P3-P7: 分析与输出
完成信息收集和计算后，按以下流程执行：
1. **扫描**: 快速识别命盘中的关键模式和特征
2. **追问**: 根据需要向用户提出针对性问题
3. **分析**: 深度分析，结合知识库检索结果
4. **输出**: 调用展示工具（show_xxx）呈现分析结果
5. **讨论**: 回答用户的追问

"""

        # 当前状态摘要
        rules += "### 当前状态\n"
        rules += f"- 出生信息: {'✅ 已有' if status['has_birth_info'] else '❌ 未收集'}\n"
        rules += f"- 命盘数据: {'✅ 已计算' if status['has_chart_data'] else '❌ 未计算'}\n"
        rules += f"- 可以分析: {'✅ 是' if status['ready_for_analysis'] else '❌ 否，请先完成上述步骤'}\n"

        return rules

    async def _build_system_prompt(self, message: str, context: AgentContext) -> str:
        """构建 System Prompt - v7.2: 包含 SOP 规则"""
        parts = []

        # 基础 prompt
        if self._active_skill:
            # 传递完整 profile，让 skill_loader 自动处理所有字段
            user_ctx = dict(context.profile) if context.profile else {}
            user_ctx["portrait"] = context.portrait
            base_prompt = build_system_prompt(
                self._active_skill,
                self._active_scenario,
                user_ctx
            )
            parts.append(base_prompt)

            # v7.2: 添加 SOP 规则（替代 SOPEngine）
            sop_rules = self._build_sop_rules(context)
            if sop_rules:
                parts.append(sop_rules)

            # 知识检索
            try:
                knowledge = await self.knowledge_repo.search_knowledge(
                    self._active_skill, message, top_k=5
                )
                if knowledge:
                    knowledge_text = "\n## 相关知识\n\n"
                    for chunk in knowledge:
                        knowledge_text += f"**{chunk.book_name}** ({chunk.chapter or ''})\n{chunk.chunk_text[:500]}...\n\n"
                    parts.append(knowledge_text)
            except Exception as e:
                logger.warning(f"Knowledge retrieval failed: {e}")

            # 案例匹配 - 使用智能匹配器
            try:
                from .case_matcher import match_cases_smart
                cases = await match_cases_smart(
                    self.knowledge_repo,
                    skill_id=self._active_skill,
                    scenario_id=self._active_scenario,
                    skill_data=context.skill_data,
                    top_k=2
                )
                if cases:
                    cases_text = "\n## 相关案例\n\n"
                    for case in cases:
                        cases_text += f"**{case.name}**\n{json.dumps(case.conclusion, ensure_ascii=False)}\n\n"
                    parts.append(cases_text)
            except Exception as e:
                logger.warning(f"Case matching failed: {e}")
        else:
            # 无 skill 时，添加触发规则
            triggers = get_skill_triggers()
            if triggers:
                trigger_rules = "## 技能触发规则\n\n当用户消息包含以下关键词时，调用 `use_skill` 工具：\n"
                for skill_name, keywords in triggers.items():
                    trigger_rules += f"- **{skill_name}**: {', '.join(keywords)}\n"
                parts.append(trigger_rules)

        # 用户命盘数据（使用 compute_type 读取，支持跨 skill 复用）
        if context.skill_data and self._active_skill:
            compute_type = get_skill_compute_type(self._active_skill) or self._active_skill
            skill_data = context.skill_data.get(compute_type, {})
            if skill_data:
                parts.append(f"\n## 用户命盘数据\n{json.dumps(skill_data, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)}")

        return "\n".join(parts)

    def _get_current_tools(self, context: AgentContext) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
        """获取当前可用工具 - V6: 从统一注册表获取"""
        if not context.skill and not self._active_skill:
            return [get_use_skill_tool()]

        skill_id = self._active_skill or context.skill

        # 从统一注册表获取工具（YAML 为数据源）
        tools = ToolRegistry.get_tools_for_skill(skill_id)
        return tools if tools else [get_use_skill_tool()]

    async def _execute_tool(
        self,
        tool_name: str,
        tool_args: str,
        context: AgentContext
    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """执行工具调用 - V6.1: 完全使用统一注册表"""
        try:
            args = json.loads(tool_args) if tool_args else {}
        except json.JSONDecodeError:
            args = {}

        # 特殊处理 use_skill（路由工具）
        if tool_name == "use_skill":
            return await self._handle_use_skill(args, context)

        # 创建工具上下文
        tool_context = ToolContext(
            user_id=context.user_id,
            user_tier=context.user_tier,
            profile=context.profile or {},
            skill_data=context.skill_data or {},
            skill_id=self._active_skill,
            scenario_id=self._active_scenario,
            conversation_id=context.conversation_id
        )

        # 使用统一注册表执行工具
        if ToolRegistry.has_handler(tool_name):
            return await ToolRegistry.execute(tool_name, args, tool_context)

        # 未找到处理器
        logger.warning(f"No handler found for tool: {tool_name}")
        return {"status": "unknown_tool", "tool": tool_name, "message": f"工具 {tool_name} 暂未实现"}

    async def _handle_use_skill(
        self,
        args: Dict[str, Any],
        context: AgentContext
    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """处理 skill 选择 - V6: 一次决定 skill + scenario + confidence"""
        skill = args.get("skill")
        scenario = args.get("scenario", "basic_reading")
        confidence = args.get("confidence", "high")
        topic = args.get("topic", "general")

        if not skill:
            return {"status": "error", "message": "No skill specified"}

        self._active_skill = skill
        self._active_scenario = scenario
        self._topic = topic

        # 低置信度时，返回确认请求
        if confidence == "low":
            return {
                "status": "need_confirm",
                "skill": skill,
                "scenario": scenario,
                "confidence": confidence,
                "message": f"我理解您可能想使用 {skill} 的 {scenario} 服务，请确认是否正确？"
            }

        # 检查是否需要出生信息（v7.1: 配置驱动）
        needs_birth = skill_requires_birth_info(skill)
        birth_info = context.profile.get("birth_info", {}) if context.profile else {}
        has_birth = bool(birth_info.get("birth_date") or birth_info.get("date"))
        birth_provided = args.get("birth_info_provided", False)

        if needs_birth and not has_birth and not birth_provided:
            # v7.3: 从 SKILL.md 配置读取 collect_tool
            collect_tool = get_skill_collect_tool(skill) or "request_info"
            return {
                "status": "need_info",
                "skill": skill,
                "scenario": scenario,
                "confidence": confidence,
                "topic": topic,
                "info_type": "birth",
                "message": f"技能已激活。请调用 {collect_tool} 工具收集出生信息。"
            }

        return {
            "status": "activated",
            "skill": skill,
            "scenario": scenario,
            "confidence": confidence,
            "topic": topic,
            "message": f"已激活 {skill} 技能，场景: {scenario}"
        }


def create_agent(
    llm: Optional[LLMClient] = None,
    max_iterations: int = 10
) -> CoreAgent:
    """创建 CoreAgent 实例"""
    return CoreAgent(llm=llm, max_iterations=max_iterations)

1→"""
     2→SkillLoader v7 - 支持 Agentic + Rule 架构的 Skill 加载器
     3→
     4→v7 架构：
     5→- SKILL.md: 核心定义（专家身份、能力索引、伦理边界）
     6→- rules/*.md: 规则文件（分析要点、输出要求、常见问题）
     7→- scenarios/*.md: (旧架构兼容) MiniSkill 场景文件
     8→- tools/*.py: 工具定义（收集/计算/展示/检索）
     9→"""
    10→import re
    11→import json
    12→import logging
    13→from pathlib import Path
    14→from dataclasses import dataclass, field
    15→from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Any
    16→from functools import lru_cache
    17→
    18→logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    19→
    20→SKILLS_DIR = Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent / "skills"
    21→
    22→
    23→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    24→# 数据结构
    25→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    26→
    27→@dataclass
    28→class SkillConfig:
    29→    """Skill 核心配置（从 SKILL.md 加载）"""
    30→    id: str
    31→    name: str
    32→    description: str
    33→    expert_persona: str
    34→    scenarios: Dict[str, List[str]]  # {entry: [...], standard: [...], professional: [...]}
    35→    ethics: Dict[str, Any]
    36→    tools: List[str]
    37→    default_scenario: str = "basic_reading"
    38→    triggers: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)
    39→    global_tools: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)  # 需要的全局工具
    40→    # v7.1: SOP 配置驱动
    41→    requires_birth_info: bool = False  # 是否需要出生信息
    42→    requires_compute: bool = False     # 是否需要计算（排盘）
    43→    compute_type: Optional[str] = None # 计算类型：bazi/zodiac/tarot，None 表示使用自身
    44→    compute_tool: Optional[str] = None # 计算工具名，None 时使用默认约定 calculate_{compute_type}
    45→    collect_tool: Optional[str] = None # 收集工具名，None 时使用默认约定 request_info
    46→    external_tools: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)  # v7.3: 从其他 skill 导入的工具
    47→
    48→
    49→@dataclass
    50→class ServiceItem:
    51→    """服务项（用于服务目录展示）"""
    52→    scenario_id: str
    53→    name: str
    54→    icon: str
    55→    description: str
    56→    tier: str  # entry/standard/professional
    57→    billing: str  # 免费/基础/高级
    58→    highlights: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)  # 价值点
    59→
    60→
    61→@dataclass
    62→class ScenarioConfig:
    63→    """场景配置（从 scenarios/*.md 加载）"""
    64→    id: str
    65→    name: str
    66→    level: str  # entry/standard/professional
    67→    billing: str  # free/basic/premium
    68→    description: str
    69→    triggers: Dict[str, List[str]]  # {primary: [...], secondary: [...]}
    70→    prerequisites: List[str]
    71→    sop: List[Dict[str, Any]]  # SOP 阶段列表
    72→    knowledge_config: Dict[str, Any]  # 知识检索配置
    73→    output_config: Dict[str, Any]  # 输出配置
    74→    tools: List[str]
    75→
    76→
    77→@dataclass
    78→class ToolMetadata:
    79→    """工具元数据"""
    80→    name: str
    81→    description: str
    82→    tool_type: str  # collect/calculate/display/search
    83→    card_type: Optional[str] = None
    84→    card_props_schema: Optional[Dict] = None
    85→    parameters: Dict[str, Any] = field(default_factory=dict)
    86→    when_to_call: Optional[str] = None
    87→
    88→
    89→@dataclass
    90→class RuleConfig:
    91→    """规则配置（从 rules/*.md 加载）- v7 新增"""
    92→    id: str
    93→    name: str
    94→    impact: str  # CRITICAL/HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW
    95→    impact_description: str
    96→    tags: List[str]
    97→    content: str  # 完整的规则内容
    98→    analysis_steps: List[Dict[str, Any]]  # 分析要点表格
    99→    output_requirements: str  # 输出要求
   100→    common_questions: str  # 常见问题
   101→
   102→
   103→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   104→# 解析函数
   105→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   106→
   107→def parse_frontmatter(text: str) -> tuple[Dict, str]:
   108→    """解析 YAML frontmatter"""
   109→    pattern = r'^---\s*\n(.*?)\n---\s*\n(.*)$'
   110→    match = re.match(pattern, text, re.DOTALL)
   111→    if not match:
   112→        return {}, text
   113→
   114→    frontmatter_str, content = match.groups()
   115→    metadata = {}
   116→    current_key = None
   117→    current_list = None
   118→
   119→    for line in frontmatter_str.strip().split('\n'):
   120→        stripped = line.strip()
   121→        if not stripped:
   122→            continue
   123→        if stripped.startswith('- ') and current_key:
   124→            if current_list is None:
   125→                current_list = []
   126→            current_list.append(stripped[2:].strip())
   127→            metadata[current_key] = current_list
   128→        elif ':' in line and not line.startswith(' '):
   129→            current_list = None
   130→            key, value = line.split(':', 1)
   131→            current_key = key.strip()
   132→            value = value.strip()
   133→            if value in ('|', ''):
   134→                continue
   135→            elif value.lower() == 'true':
   136→                metadata[current_key] = True
   137→            elif value.lower() == 'false':
   138→                metadata[current_key] = False
   139→            else:
   140→                metadata[current_key] = value
   141→
   142→    return metadata, content.strip()
   143→
   144→
   145→def parse_skill_md(text: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   146→    """解析 SKILL.md 内容，提取结构化信息
   147→
   148→    支持两种触发词格式：
   149→    1. 旧格式：frontmatter 中的 triggers: 列表
   150→    2. 新格式：description 中的 "触发词：xxx、xxx、xxx"
   151→    """
   152→    metadata, content = parse_frontmatter(text)
   153→
   154→    # 从 frontmatter 获取触发词（旧格式）
   155→    triggers = metadata.get("triggers", [])
   156→
   157→    # 如果 frontmatter 没有 triggers，尝试从 description 中提取（新格式）
   158→    if not triggers:
   159→        description = metadata.get("description", "")
   160→        # 匹配 "触发词：xxx、xxx、xxx" 或 "触发词:xxx,xxx,xxx"
   161→        trigger_match = re.search(r'触发词[：:]\s*([^。.]+)', description)
   162→        if trigger_match:
   163→            trigger_str = trigger_match.group(1)
   164→            # 支持顿号、逗号分隔
   165→            triggers = [t.strip() for t in re.split(r'[、,，]', trigger_str) if t.strip()]
   166→
   167→    result = {
   168→        "id": metadata.get("id", ""),
   169→        "name": metadata.get("name", ""),
   170→        "description": metadata.get("description", ""),
   171→        "triggers": triggers,
   172→        "default_scenario": metadata.get("default_scenario", "basic_reading"),
   173→        "global_tools": metadata.get("global_tools", []),  # 从 frontmatter 读取
   174→        # v7.1: SOP 配置驱动
   175→        "requires_birth_info": metadata.get("requires_birth_info", False),
   176→        "requires_compute": metadata.get("requires_compute", False),
   177→        "compute_type": metadata.get("compute_type", None),
   178→        "compute_tool": metadata.get("compute_tool", None),
   179→        "collect_tool": metadata.get("collect_tool", None),
   180→        "external_tools": metadata.get("external_tools", []),  # v7.3
   181→    }
   182→
   183→    # 提取专家身份
   184→    expert_match = re.search(r'## 专家身份\s*\n(.*?)(?=\n## |\Z)', content, re.DOTALL)
   185→    result["expert_persona"] = expert_match.group(1).strip() if expert_match else ""
   186→
   187→    # 提取场景目录
   188→    scenarios = {"entry": [], "standard": [], "professional": []}
   189→    for level in scenarios.keys():
   190→        pattern = rf'### {level.capitalize()}.*?\n\|.*?\n\|.*?\n((?:\|.*?\n)*)'
   191→        match = re.search(pattern, content, re.IGNORECASE | re.DOTALL)
   192→        if match:
   193→            for row in match.group(1).strip().split('\n'):
   194→                cols = [c.strip() for c in row.split('|')[1:-1]]
   195→                if len(cols) >= 2:
   196→                    scenarios[level].append(cols[1])  # 文件名
   197→    result["scenarios"] = scenarios
   198→
   199→    # 提取伦理边界
   200→    ethics = {"forbidden": [], "sensitive": [], "principles": []}
   201→    forbidden_match = re.search(r'### 绝对禁止\s*\n((?:- .*?\n)*)', content)
   202→    if forbidden_match:
   203→        ethics["forbidden"] = [l[2:].strip() for l in forbidden_match.group(1).strip().split('\n')]
   204→    result["ethics"] = ethics
   205→
   206→    # 提取工具列表
   207→    tools = []
   208→    tools_match = re.search(r'## 工具列表\s*\n\|.*?\n\|.*?\n((?:\|.*?\n)*)', content)
   209→    if tools_match:
   210→        for row in tools_match.group(1).strip().split('\n'):
   211→            cols = [c.strip() for c in row.split('|')[1:-1]]
   212→            if len(cols) >= 1:
   213→                tools.append(cols[0])
   214→    result["tools"] = tools
   215→
   216→    return result
   217→
   218→
   219→def parse_scenario_md(text: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   220→    """解析 scenario.md 内容"""
   221→    metadata, content = parse_frontmatter(text)
   222→
   223→    result = {
   224→        "id": metadata.get("id", ""),
   225→        "name": metadata.get("name", ""),
   226→        "level": metadata.get("level", "entry"),
   227→        "billing": metadata.get("billing", "free"),
   228→        "description": metadata.get("description", ""),
   229→    }
   230→
   231→    # 提取触发条件
   232→    triggers = {"primary": [], "secondary": []}
   233→    primary_match = re.search(r'\*\*主要触发词\*\*:\s*(.*?)(?:\n|$)', content)
   234→    if primary_match:
   235→        triggers["primary"] = [t.strip() for t in primary_match.group(1).split(',')]
   236→    secondary_match = re.search(r'\*\*次要触发词\*\*:\s*(.*?)(?:\n|$)', content)
   237→    if secondary_match:
   238→        triggers["secondary"] = [t.strip() for t in secondary_match.group(1).split(',')]
   239→    result["triggers"] = triggers
   240→
   241→    # 提取前置要求
   242→    prereq_match = re.search(r'## 前置要求\s*\n((?:- .*?\n)*)', content)
   243→    result["prerequisites"] = []
   244→    if prereq_match:
   245→        result["prerequisites"] = [l[2:].strip() for l in prereq_match.group(1).strip().split('\n')]
   246→
   247→    # 提取 SOP 阶段
   248→    sop = []
   249→    phase_pattern = r'### Phase (\d+):\s*(.*?)\n(.*?)(?=### Phase|\Z)'
   250→    for match in re.finditer(phase_pattern, content, re.DOTALL):
   251→        phase_num, phase_name, phase_content = match.groups()
   252→        phase = {
   253→            "phase": int(phase_num),
   254→            "name": phase_name.strip(),
   255→            "content": phase_content.strip()
   256→        }
   257→        # 提取类型
   258→        type_match = re.search(r'\*\*类型\*\*:\s*(\w+)', phase_content)
   259→        if type_match:
   260→            phase["type"] = type_match.group(1)
   261→        sop.append(phase)
   262→    result["sop"] = sop
   263→
   264→    # 提取工具列表
   265→    tools_match = re.search(r'\*\*使用工具\*\*:\s*\n((?:- .*?\n)*)', content)
   266→    result["tools"] = []
   267→    if tools_match:
   268→        result["tools"] = [l[2:].strip() for l in tools_match.group(1).strip().split('\n')]
   269→
   270→    # 知识检索配置
   271→    result["knowledge_config"] = {}
   272→    result["output_config"] = {}
   273→
   274→    return result
   275→
   276→
   277→def parse_rule_md(text: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   278→    """解析 rules/*.md 内容 - v7 新增"""
   279→    metadata, content = parse_frontmatter(text)
   280→
   281→    # 解析 tags（支持逗号分隔的字符串或列表）
   282→    tags_raw = metadata.get("tags", [])
   283→    if isinstance(tags_raw, str):
   284→        tags = [t.strip() for t in re.split(r'[,，、]', tags_raw) if t.strip()]
   285→    else:
   286→        tags = tags_raw
   287→
   288→    result = {
   289→        "id": metadata.get("id", ""),
   290→        "name": metadata.get("name", ""),
   291→        "impact": metadata.get("impact", "MEDIUM"),
   292→        "impact_description": metadata.get("impactDescription", ""),
   293→        "tags": tags,
   294→        "content": content,
   295→    }
   296→
   297→    # 提取分析要点表格
   298→    analysis_steps = []
   299→    table_match = re.search(r'## 分析要点\s*\n\|[^\n]+\n\|[-\s|]+\n((?:\|[^\n]+\n)*)', content)
   300→    if table_match:
   301→        for row in table_match.group(1).strip().split('\n'):
   302→            cols = [c.strip() for c in row.split('|')[1:-1]]
   303→            if len(cols) >= 4:
   304→                analysis_steps.append({
   305→                    "step": cols[0],
   306→                    "point": cols[1],
   307→                    "query": cols[2],
   308→                    "priority": cols[3],
   309→                })
   310→    result["analysis_steps"] = analysis_steps
   311→
   312→    # 提取输出要求
   313→    output_match = re.search(r'## 输出要求\s*\n(.*?)(?=\n## |\Z)', content, re.DOTALL)
   314→    result["output_requirements"] = output_match.group(1).strip() if output_match else ""
   315→
   316→    # 提取常见问题
   317→    faq_match = re.search(r'## 常见问题\s*\n(.*?)(?=\n## |\Z)', content, re.DOTALL)
   318→    result["common_questions"] = faq_match.group(1).strip() if faq_match else ""
   319→
   320→    return result
   321→
   322→
   323→def parse_skill_services(text: str) -> Dict[str, List[Dict[str, Any]]]:
   324→    """解析 SKILL.md 中的服务目录，提取展示信息"""
   325→    services = {"entry": [], "standard": [], "professional": []}
   326→
   327→    tier_map = {
   328→        "entry": "entry",
   329→        "standard": "standard",
   330→        "professional": "professional"
   331→    }
   332→
   333→    for tier_name, tier_key in tier_map.items():
   334→        # 匹配表格头和内容
   335→        pattern = rf'### {tier_name.capitalize()}.*?\n\|[^\n]+\n\|[-\s|]+\n((?:\|[^\n]+\n)*)'
   336→        match = re.search(pattern, text, re.IGNORECASE | re.DOTALL)
   337→        if not match:
   338→            continue
   339→
   340→        table_content = match.group(1).strip()
   341→        if not table_content:
   342→            continue
   343→
   344→        for row in table_content.split('\n'):
   345→            cols = [c.strip() for c in row.split('|')[1:-1]]
   346→            if len(cols) < 7:  # 至少需要 7 列（场景、文件、触发词、计费、展示名称、图标、简介）
   347→                continue
   348→
   349→            service = {
   350→                "scenario_id": cols[1].replace('.md', '') if cols[1] else cols[0].lower().replace(' ', '_'),
   351→                "name": cols[4] if len(cols) > 4 and cols[4] else cols[0],
   352→                "icon": cols[5] if len(cols) > 5 and cols[5] else "📌",
   353→                "description": cols[6] if len(cols) > 6 and cols[6] else "",
   354→                "tier": tier_key,
   355→                "billing": cols[3] if len(cols) > 3 else "免费",
   356→                "highlights": []
   357→            }
   358→
   359→            # 解析价值点（第8列，如果存在）
   360→            if len(cols) > 7 and cols[7]:
   361→                service["highlights"] = [h.strip() for h in cols[7].split(',')]
   362→
   363→            services[tier_key].append(service)
   364→
   365→    return services
   366→
   367→
   368→def get_skill_services(skill_id: str) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
   369→    """获取 Skill 的服务目录数据（用于 show_skill_services 工具）"""
   370→    skill_path = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "SKILL.md"
   371→    if not skill_path.exists():
   372→        return None
   373→
   374→    text = skill_path.read_text(encoding='utf-8')
   375→    metadata, _ = parse_frontmatter(text)
   376→    services = parse_skill_services(text)
   377→
   378→    return {
   379→        "skill_id": skill_id,
   380→        "skill_name": metadata.get("name", skill_id),
   381→        "description": metadata.get("description", ""),
   382→        "services": services
   383→    }

   387→# 加载函数

   390→@lru_cache(maxsize=32)
   391→def load_skill(skill_id: str) -> Optional[SkillConfig]:
   392→    """加载 Skill 核心配置"""
   393→    skill_path = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "SKILL.md"
   394→    if not skill_path.exists():
   395→        return None
   396→
   397→    text = skill_path.read_text(encoding='utf-8')
   398→    data = parse_skill_md(text)
   399→
   400→    return SkillConfig(
   401→        id=data.get("id", skill_id),
   402→        name=data.get("name", skill_id),
   403→        description=data.get("description", ""),
   404→        expert_persona=data.get("expert_persona", ""),
   405→        scenarios=data.get("scenarios", {}),
   406→        ethics=data.get("ethics", {}),
   407→        tools=data.get("tools", []),
   408→        default_scenario=data.get("default_scenario", "basic_reading"),
   409→        triggers=data.get("triggers", []),
   410→        global_tools=data.get("global_tools", []),
   411→        # v7.1: SOP 配置驱动
   412→        requires_birth_info=data.get("requires_birth_info", False),
   413→        requires_compute=data.get("requires_compute", False),
   414→        compute_type=data.get("compute_type", None),
   415→        compute_tool=data.get("compute_tool", None),
   416→        collect_tool=data.get("collect_tool", None),
   417→        external_tools=data.get("external_tools", []),  # v7.3
   418→    )
   419→

   421→@lru_cache(maxsize=64)

   442→        tools=data.get("tools", [])
   443→    )

   477→def has_rules(skill_id: str) -> bool:

   479→    rules_dir = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "rules"

   486→def get_available_skills() -> List[str]:

   488→    if not SKILLS_DIR.exists():

   490→    return [p.name for p in SKILLS_DIR.iterdir()

   494→def get_skill_scenarios(skill_id: str) -> List[str]:
   495→    """获取 Skill 的所有场景
   496→
   497→    支持两种架构：
   498→    1. 旧架构：scenarios/*.md
   499→    2. 新架构：rules/*.md（Agentic 架构）
   500→    """
   501→    # 优先检查 rules 目录（新架构）
   502→    rules_dir = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "rules"
   503→    if rules_dir.exists():
   504→        rules = [p.stem for p in rules_dir.glob("*.md") if not p.stem.startswith("_")]
   505→        if rules:
   506→            return rules
   507→
   508→    # 回退到 scenarios 目录（旧架构）
   509→    scenarios_dir = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "scenarios"
   510→    if not scenarios_dir.exists():
   511→        return []
   512→    return [p.stem for p in scenarios_dir.glob("*.md")]

   515→def get_skill_triggers() -> Dict[str, List[str]]:
   516→    """获取所有 Skill 的触发词"""
   517→    triggers = {}
   518→    for skill_id in get_available_skills():
   519→        if skill_id == "core":
   520→            continue
   521→        skill = load_skill(skill_id)
   522→        if skill and skill.triggers:
   523→            triggers[skill_id] = skill.triggers
   524→    return triggers

   530→    if skill and skill.global_tools:

   532→    # 默认返回所有全局工具（向后兼容）

   536→def get_skill_external_tools(skill_id: str) -> List[str]:

   538→    skill = load_skill(skill_id)
   539→    if skill and skill.external_tools:
   540→        return skill.external_tools
   541→    return []
